entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Earth 01:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
